Description: Two joining fragments of neck and flattened handle to moderate turn of a Knidan pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine grey-brown. Rectangular stamp with leaf? symbol.
Type series: KT760 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (308)
